RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 36300. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 18 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,00 0 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JACKS SISTER JILL contested the pace from the start, dueled at even terms two deep on the turn and dug in determinedly to clear Witness The Energy in later yards. CEDAR'S WISH broke a step slow, gave chase through the backstretch and raced near the rail on the turn, angled out into the stretch and dug in to take second the final strides. WITNESS THE ENERGY contested the pace from the start and dueled at even terms nearest the rail on the turn, loomed a close factor through the upper stretch but relented later yards. RIVER REWARDS RVF chased the early pace outside, angled to the inside midway on the turn, left the turn at the rail and ran evenly down the lane. SIENTE LA BRISA gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn about the five path and finished evenly outside. SISTER JOANN gave chase then flattened while losing ground on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Cedar's Wish
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow break,chased,rail turn,angled out 1/8,up 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Witness the Energy
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead,dueled even terms rail turn,relented later yards

ENTRY.NAME: River Rewards Rvf
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside,angled in mid turn,rail 1/8,even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Jacks Sister Jill
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from start,even terms 2d turn,determined,clear later yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 21200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, For Each $2,500 To $10,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRUE QUEEN rated the pace inside, kept the edge over Me Darlin Kathleen leaving the three eighths pole, pulled clear of that one toward the five sixteenths, drew off at the rail on the far turn and extended her lead of her own initiative. CREDIT COMMITTEE rated just off the pace inside on the first turn, gave chase leaving the half mile pole, rounded the far turn at the rail and dug in to take second late yards. ME DARLIN KATHLEEN stalked two deep then challenged toward the three eighths pole, dropped back approaching the five sixteenths and ran evenly in the lane. BLUE AGAVE saved ground, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced two deep on the far turn and weakened in the stretch. SARATOGA CENTS raced just off the pace two deep on the first turn, gave chase into the backstretch but weakened past the five sixteenths pole. BEAUTIFUL MICHELLE and IRISH CREAM showed little response through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: True Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,kept edge from 3/8,clear 5/16,widened handily

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Highclere Inc., Rocky Top Racing LLC & Springtown Show Sta

ENTRY.NAME: Credit Committee
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace inside,chased 1/2,rail far turn,up 2nd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Three Races Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 18 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races No t Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEBIT CARD raced with the early pace two deep, took the nod nearing the half mile pole and dueled clear past the quarter, widened at the rail on the far turn and was steadily handled in the lane. SUE LOVES BARBADOS rounded the opening turn about the three path, picked up the chase leaving the half mile pole, raced in the three and four paths of the far turn and dug in to take second later yards. MOTAWAAFEQ rated close inside, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn, eased out leaving the turn and came along for third later yards. JUNGLE BEAST rated close about the three path, gave chase from the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn two deep and flattened inside the sixteenth pole. PYEONG CHANG raced with the pace inside, was met toward the half mile pole and dueled into the backstretch, but dropped back toward the quarter and faded in the lane. SANTO raced well off the pace inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Motawaafeq
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,chased 7/16,off rail far turn,along 3rd late

ENTRY.NAME: Sue Loves Barbados
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p,chased 1/2,3& 4p far turn,up 2nd later yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR MAIDENS, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHADOW BOX took the lead nearing the three quarter pole and rated the pace, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, widened at the rail on the far turn and was steadily handled in the lane. MOSES WATER settled off the rail on the opening turn, bid nearing the three eighths pole and raced at the rail on the far turn, then dueled through the stretch for second. FANEUIL HALL stalked off the rail, picked up the chase toward the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail, eased out leaving the turn then outfinished in the stretch duel for second. SURPRISE HELLO rated close inside on the first turn, eased out into the backstretch and gave chase toward the three eighths, rounded the far turn in the three path and flattened in the lane. ADARA rounded the first turn about the three path, picked up the chase toward the three eighths pole, raced near the rail on the far turn and weakened. SHAKIN IT BIG TIME saved ground. SHAMELESS APPEAL came away awkwardly then saved ground off the pace, showed little response through the backstretch and was eased the final quarter mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Surprise Hello
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,eased out 1/2,chased 3/8,3p far turn,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,widened turn,steady handling lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,000 1 lb. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility)(Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Le ss Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SO COURAGEOUS set a pressured early pace then dueled at even terms from the three eighths pole, contested the turn two deep and dug in determinedly to inch clear of the game challenge of FROGGY THE GREMLIN in the final yards. The latter dueled at even terms from the three eighths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and dug in gamely to deep stretch before reluctantly ceding the final yards. DOC ELM gave chase, rounded the turn in the three path then dueled through the stretch for third. ROLL DEM BONES chased inside, raced near the rail on the turn then outfinished in the stretch duel for third. FEARNOUGHT chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn at the rail, eased out leaving the turn and ran evenly in the lane. CHARITABLY GIFTED engaged in close early chase, raced in the four path of the turn then flattened inside the eighth pole.

ENTRY.NAME: Froggy the Gremlin
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from 3/8,even terms rail turn,game effort,reluctant yield

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Ollie L. Figgins III & Carisa Figgins

ENTRY.NAME: Charitably Gifted
ENTRY.OWNER: Shepherd Robert Phillips Jason and Harrison Glenn N

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 21200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, For Each $2,500 To $10,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOOKA LOOKA ducked out and made contact with Wesright leaving the gate, went right to the lead and rated the pace inside, came under pressure near the three eighths pole, contested the edge at the rail on the far turn and dug in determinedly to hold off the challenge of MALIBU ROCK STAR through the stretch. The latter rated close inside, started a bid approaching the three eighths pole, raced at near even terms in the three path of the far turn and dueled gamely to the wire. ONLY GET'N BETTER saved ground well back from early contention, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole and rounded the far turn about the four path, left the turn outside and finished evenly for third. CHROME HEIR rounded the first turn in the five path, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the three path of the far turn, was eased out leaving the turn and passed rivals. TAKE AIM rounded the first turn in the three and four paths, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn then flattened. UNKNOWN AGENDA raced two deep on the first turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole but flattened at the rail on the far turn. BODYSLAM stalked from the three and four paths, started a bid toward the three eighths pole, raced in the four path of the far turn then flattened stride. WESRIGHT was bumped at the break then stalked two deep, challenged toward the three eighths pole but faded off the rail on the far turn. SHADE TREE CORNER became a bit anxious in the gate then saved ground. TACOMA AUSTIN raced well off the pace in the three path, left the first turn outside and gave chase from the seven sixteenths, but weakened in the five path of the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Looka Looka
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked out,bumped,pace inside,edge rail far turn,determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Wesright
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,stalked,challenged 3/8,faded off rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Rock Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside, bid near 3/8,close 3p turn,game,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Unknown Agenda
ENTRY.OWNER: JBD Ranch LLC and Jones Duane

ENTRY.NAME: Take Aim
ENTRY.OWNER: Jones Jr Michael E and JKX Racing

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 34900. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 18 Al lowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since December 18 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISE A SPEIGHTS moved to the inside and rated the pace, came under pressure toward the three eighths pole, widened at the rail on the far turn and was kept alert in the lane. MARK DID IT raced off the early pace in the three and four paths and stalked from the seven eighths pole, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths, rounded the far turn off the rail then dueled through the stretch for second. LATE IN THE GAME settled in the four path the first turn and stalked into the backstretch, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn about the four path and was outfinished in the stretch duel for second. RIDICULOUS raced off the pace and off the rail, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn two deep then flattened in the lane. WITH SECRET ENERGY saved ground close to the pace, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and weakened in the lane. ERAWAN saved ground racing well back, picked up the chase from the half mile pole, ran in the three path of the far turn and showed little in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Raise a Speights
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,widened rail turn,kept alert lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mark Did It
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: Ridiculous
ENTRY.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 15700. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 18, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOMMY SHELBY stalked inside leaving the half mile pole, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole and dueled at even terms from that point, contested the rail through the far turn, raced clear past the eighth pole and was steadily handled in the lane. PROTA took the lead three wide approaching the nine sixteenths pole and rated the pace, came under pressure toward the three eighths, was met at the five sixteenths, contested the far turn at even terms two deep, dropped back leaving the eighth pole but carried on in an even finish. FRANKEE MERCH saved ground close to the early pace, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail then dueled through the stretch for third. HAPPY CHAMP saved early ground, bid nearing the seven sixteenths pole, raced three wide on the far turn then outfinished in the stretch duel for third. CAYENNE CREEK saved ground on the first turn, picked up the chase toward the three eighths pole, raced in the four path of the far turn and showed little further. FORT FORTITUDE raced well back in the three and four paths, left the first turn outside and gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the five path and had little left. PENNSYLVANIA STEEL had a brief early lead inside, was caught at the nine sixteenths pole and gave chase into the backstretch, but faded at the rail on the far turn. SUGAR DADDY rounded the first turn about the six path, made a bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and weakened in the lane. ROSE'S GALAXY raced in the five path the first turn and rated close into the backstretch, gave chase toward the seven sixteenths pole but faded past the three eighths. U ROCK IT rounded the opening turn in the four path, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole but faded in the three path of the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Cayenne Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 3/8,4p far turn,little in lane

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Champ
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Country Life Farm & Moon Map Broodmare LLC
